page.title: 17A Survey of Scartho. Part 3.
page.content: {Social Concerns. The{population}of our area has not increased much for quite a while. At the moment there are approximately{11 000}people living in our area. According to interview sources, facilities for the young are not too bad and there is not a great deal of street violence. The{crime {rate}is much as it has been for years.There are many old people living in our area who cannot easily get out of their houses.The{council}is working together with the{church}to help old people in this respect. {Religion. According to interview sources, the majority of people in our area are not very interested in the {church,}though attendances are quite high, especially from the{middle {classes}and{professions.
